svg.script: var c=window.location.search.split('color=')[1]; c=parseInt(c,16); if(!isNaN(c)){c=c.toString(16);var p=document.getElementsByTagName('path');for(var i=0,l=p.length;i<l;i++){var s=p[i].style;s.fill='#'+c;} var p2=document.getElementsByTagName('polygon');for(var i=0,l=p2.length;i<l;i++){var s=p2[i].style;s.fill='#'+c;} var p3=document.getElementsByTagName('circle');for(var i=0,l=p3.length;i<l;i++){var s=p3[i].style;s.fill='#'+c;} }
